body:
hi @Ivy-ZOU I would update your code to the latest; a  lot of updates to the code since then (see releases). 

But your error "ValueError: Could not reconstruct 2 tracks from the tracklets given" is a real error, if the algorithm cannot find 2 animals from your data. You need to (1) check how good the detections are by doing this: https://deeplabcut.github.io/DeepLabCut/docs/maDLC_UserGuide.html#attention
(2) if and only if detections are good, then proceed. The latest versions also have autoTrack=True, so I would use this feature.

Thank you very much for your reply! Since I stalled on 2.2.0.3 windows, I switched to Linux. I am using ubuntu, and training with dlc2.2.3 now. 
I use 150 frames from video A for training and I think the model good. I can get the .h5 file of video A after analyze video, but when I analyze video B, I got four .pickle files and two errors.  When I choose the number of animals to be 1, I can get .h5 file, even though there are two animals on the video. 
Both videos were shot in almost the same scene, and both have only two animals(fish). May I ask if this is because I made a mistake in any step? I really don't know why. I've tried everything I know.
This is the output I got.
